text: velmutallekatu yeterabbasne bienfusihinne selasete kuru'. vela yehillu lehunne ey yektumne ma haleka-llahu fi erhamihinne in kunne yu'minne billahi velyevmi-l'ahir. vebu`uletuhunne ehakku biraddihinne fi zalike in eradu islaha. velehunne mislu-llezi `aleyhinne bilma`ruf. velirricali `aleyhinne deraceh. vellahu `azizun hakim
